Arrow: I don't think that'll work, it could be a very old listing.

(Meanwh=
ile)

Deemos (thinking): If someone wants to contact me, they'd probably lo=
ok up my old number.

He types his old number into his commlink and waits.
=

(Meanwhile)

Arrow dials the number.

Deemos over comm unit: Hello. No tim=
e to waste, location.

Arrow reads off the address of the place. Since that=
 it was so secret, I won't tell it here. (I don't know it)

Arrow: It worke=
d...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: RoboRick007
  To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com
  Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 1:28 AM
  Subject: Re: Secret Me=
ssages


  : : Diesel : :

  Diesel tries to think of a way to reach Deemos=
. He finally comes up with something, but a long shot.

  Diesel: Well I wo=
uldn't know. We can try the listings for his comm channel. A bot like him p=
robably isn't listed, but it's all I can think to do.

  Diesel sits at a c=
omputer and starts to search through records. After about ten minutes he co=
mes up with it. He stands back from the comp.

  Diesel: Well I'll be a Sha=
rkticon, here it is. Try this channel.

  He points to the list on the scre=
en.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Iron Man Lives Again! 
    =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 1:14 AM
    S=
ubject: Re: Secret Messages


    Arrow: The message sent asked for another=
 person. whom I recognize. His name is Deemos, and he used to be both an al=
ly and an enemy of mine at different times. He's deadly, but so are we.

  =
  He crosses his arms.

    Arrow: I used to know alot of others, but I bro=
ke off from them a bit back. The one named Airbomber got very jealous of me=
. He was only greedy and an egomaniac, however. Where could we find Deemos?=
 I've long since forgotten his signal...

      ----- Original Message ----=
-
      From: RoboRick007
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Mond=
ay, August 12, 2002 12:56 AM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : :=
 Diesel : :

      He looked at Arrow. He eyes flashed and gave a very evil=
 sense. You knew that he had a maniacle smile under his faceplate.

      D=
iesel: You know it. However we should take care of some things here first. =
If we go to join Razor, we may need more men. Know of anyone?
        -----=
 Original Message ----- 
        From: Degenerate 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
        Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:39 AM
        Subject:=
 Re: Secret Messages


        OOC: If I can be serious for a minute, this =
group is the epitome of seriousness and does not deserve to be subjected to=
 a silly post. Prepare for the rebirth of the original rookie monster of NB=
W.

        BIC:

        Arrow hears Diesel's voice. His back was turned t=
o his old ally. He tries to remember where he had seen Diesel before. Memor=
ies of his past come flying back to him. They return easily when he needs t=
hem enough, he finds, the Radicons hadn't done a very good job of erasing t=
hese memories. He slowly turns around, recalling Diesel's place in his tumu=
ltuous life.

        Arrow: Ah, yes, Diesel, the message. It has been a lo=
ng time, hasn't it? Shall we get to business immediately?

        Arrow co=
uld barely remember Razor. He didn't hold anything against the Radicons for=
 damaging his memory so badly. They did what they had to, Arrow had attempt=
ed to kill them.

        Arrow: So, what now? Do we head to Earth?
       =
 ~~~~~
        Deemos was sitting in a meeting, bored.

        Leader: Gen=
tlemen, we must all band together and stop this menace! We cannot allow thi=
s other club to gain the upper hand! We truly have the best flag! The other=
s will pay for their disagreeance!

        Deemos: What kind of club is th=
is? And is disagreeance a word?

        Leader: This is not a club, this i=
s a council. It's the Council of Evil. And yes, Disagreeance is a word.

  =
      Deemos: No, you said "We cannot allow this other club to gain the upp=
er hand," apparently if there is this "other" club, this is a club.

      =
  Leader: See here--

        Deemos: I was the one who held a council. We =
were the Mafia, the most imposing group to ever exist save for the Alliance=
.

        Leader: Sir, I'm certain I don't know what you are talking about=
.

        Deemos: If this so called council is so evil, why is it that we =
are not attacking, and why is it that we are not spilling blood.

        L=
eader: Mech fluid.

        Deemos: It's the same thing. I've spilled alot =
of it.

        Leader: Well, sir, you see, we like to bide our time, and t=
hen--

        Deemos: Then you burn someone else's flag. Then they come an=
d burn yours. You don't know what violence is. I am the epitome of violence=
. The innovator. The only individuals I've seen you destroy are your own co=
mrades. Not that it's a bad thing to destroy your comrades, I've destroyed =
plenty of lackeys in my time.

        Leader: I think you're only saying t=
his because you've joined another council! I think you need to be dealt wit=
h! You're nothing more than a vicious traitor!

        Deemos: So you guys=
 are going to deal with me? Put me away? Send me to the great junkyard in t=
he sky?

        Member: Junkyard?

        Leader: Enough of this, get him=
!

        Deemos stands up. A member sitting right next to him stands up a=
s well, but he's too slow and too dumb. Deemos puts a pistol to his mid sec=
tion quickly and fires. Several bolts rip through the robot, creating sever=
al flashes and one hole leading all the way through. The unlucky one falls =
to the ground. Deemos' trigger finger quickly flicks a switch on the utilit=
y pistol as he swivels it around towards another member who was raising a r=
ifle. Deemos moves forward a single step and barely dodges a shot heading h=
is way. He fires the pistol and a barrage of 5 inch long steel nails are fi=
red at rapid speed, piercing the head of the attackee and tearing off large=
 chunks. Deemos quickly spins around, flicking a switch once more and he fi=
res. Several shots hit the robot who had fired at him, cutting down the bot=
 who shocked at Deemos' speed and severing one of his arms and his head. Th=
e cut down fellow's head rolled across the floor as the body dropped.

    =
    Leader: Idiots!

        Deemos quickly fired a few pellets on the grou=
nd, which erupted into tall flames. He was hidden from sight. A shot emerge=
s from behind the flames, passing Deemos' head by inches.

        Leader: =
Did you hear that? I think I got him.

        A grenade flies out from beh=
ind the fire and rolls near the Leader of the council's feet.

        (Cut=
 to)

        Deemos runs through the halls of the building as a massive ex=
plosion erupts behind him, detonating the room he previously occupied. It w=
as no problem escaping from these buffoons, he thought as he exited the bui=
lding, laughing at the fact that he destroyed about 20 or so more lives. He=
 decided to check his messages. His commlink system was designed to capture=
 messages and hold them for a later hearing. He had two of these. He activa=
ted the first one.

        Message: Hey, buddy, I got some of those (buzz)=
 were trying to get. It was (buzz) so, you wanna (buzz) we've--

        De=
emos deletes the message quickly. A wrong number and a bad commlink. He act=
ivates the next message. He listens to the code carefully then plays it bac=
k again. He plays it back a third time.

        Deemos: Hmm. Maybe. This s=
ounds like the old code.

        He activates his jets and flies, planning=
 to answer this message addressing him and the the one that he knew well ba=
ck on Earth, Arrow. It had been a long time since he had come in contact wi=
th Razor. He was ready for anything...

          ----- Original Message --=
---
          From: RoboRick007
          To: Neo Beast Wars
          Sent=
: Sunday, August 11, 2002 11:03 PM
          Subject: Secret Messages


   =
       : : Diesel : :

          On Cybertron a fuel tanker truck drives do=
wn an elevated street, before pulling into what looked like an abandon buil=
ding. The black and silver truck transformes into a menacing Cybertronian. =
A Decepticon too be exact. He turns to the others in the building.

       =
   Diesel: Hey Arrow, did you pick up that incoded transmission that came t=
hrough the Transwarp portal?

          He awaits a response.

          : =
: Wolfenstein : :

          While he follows Megatron deeper into the base=
. His comm system picks up a transmission. However it is heavily incoded so=
 he cannot listen too it now. He sets his comm unit to work on it, and cont=
inues on.


        Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Term=
s of Service. 



      Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! =
Terms of Service. 



    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo=
! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTI=
SEMENT
             
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the=
 Yahoo! Terms of Service.
